biography: Jonas, a familiar face from Vantaan Golfpuisto, is known for his calculated approach to the game. While he may come across as reserved, his competitors know him to be a fierce and strategic player on the course.

Having participated in the Hector Trophée twice, Jonas brings a wealth of experience to the tournament, even though he is considered retired. Although he has yet to capture the coveted Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy, his consistent performance demonstrates his dedication to the sport. This year, Jonas will not be competing, but there's always a chance we might see him again in the future.
